items.name: map
items.title: Map (React Native)
items.description: A MapLibre-powered map component for React Native with markers, popups, labels, routes, and controls.

items.name: map-maptiler
items.title: Map (React Native) [Maptiler]
items.description: A MapLibre-powered map component for React Native with markers, popups, labels, routes, and controls. Using maptiler for cheaper commercial use.

items.name: map-mapbox
items.title: Map (React Native) [Mapbox]
items.description: A Mapbox-powered map component for React Native with markers, popups, labels, routes, and controls. Using maptiler for cheaper commercial use.
